title: PM directs Interior ministry for in-depth investigation into Quetta blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, April 22 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Thursday directed the Ministry of Interior to hold an in-depth investigation into the bomb blast incident that took place in Quetta on Wednesday.
Strongly condemning the incident, the prime minister ordered to consider all aspects while carrying out the investigation.
According to PM Office, the prime minister personally monitored the situation till late night.
